name: Publisher
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Topic
Publisher
description: Topic Publisher object used to publish multiple messages at once.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
pubsub = gcloud.pubsub

topic = pubsub.topic "my-topic"
msgs = topic.publish do |t|
  t.publish "new-message-1", foo: :bar
  t.publish "new-message-2", foo: :baz
  t.publish "new-message-3", foo: :bif
end

methods.name: publish
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Topic
Publisher#publish
methods.description: Add multiple messages to the topic. All messages added will be published at once. See Google::Cloud::Pubsub::Topic#publish
